Package org.freehep.xml.io

The XMLIO package is a set of interfaces and classes to save and restore objects using XML.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XMLIO Interface to for objects that can be save/restore to/from xml.
XMLIOFactory Interface for object factories.
XMLIOProxy Interface for proxyes that can save and restore objects to/from xml.
XMLIORegistry Interface of an XMLIORegistry.
 

Class Summary
DefaultXMLIORegistry Default XMLIORegistry.
XMLIOFile This is a dummy class.
XMLIOFileFactory  
XMLIOFileManager Class XMLIOFileManager deals with xml files.
XMLIOManager The XMLIOManager is in charge of saving and restoring any object configuration through XML.
XMLIOStreamManager Class XMLIOStreamManager deals with xml files.
XMLIOUtils XMLIOUtils.
 

Package org.freehep.xml.io Description

The XMLIO package is a set of interfaces and classes to save and restore objects using XML.

@status Under Development.
